Global and local inclusion criteria are met for this construct. Construct evidence span: "All unempathic comments combined (EN + CN > EE + CE) were processed in left superior temporal gyrus and right putamen."
Missing local inclusion criteria: AFFILIATION_ATTACHMENT_I1 (contrast contrasts unempathic vs empathic processing but does not test affiliation/attachment tasks).

Global and local inclusion criteria are met for this construct. Construct evidence span: "All unempathic comments combined... processed in left superior temporal gyrus" (auditory/verbal social communication processing).
Missing local inclusion criteria: PERCEPTION_SELF_I1 (contrast does not index self-related judgments).

Global and local inclusion criteria are met for this construct. Construct evidence span: "All unempathic comments combined (EN + CN > EE + CE) were processed in left superior temporal gyrus and right putamen" (contrast involves processing social behavior directed at the subject, implicating representation of others' social intent).
Global and local inclusion criteria are met for this construct. Construct evidence span: "Cognitively unempathic comments activated the medial-orbital part of left superior frontal gyrus (CN > CE)."
Missing local inclusion criteria: AFFILIATION_ATTACHMENT_I1 (contrast concerns cognitive empathy/unempathy processing, not explicit affiliation/attachment measures).
Global and local inclusion criteria are met for this construct. Construct evidence span: "Cognitively unempathic comments activated..." (processing of verbal cognitive-empathy statements).
Missing local inclusion criteria: PERCEPTION_SELF_I1 (no self > other or explicit self-evaluation contrast present).

Global and local inclusion criteria are met for this construct. Construct evidence span: "Cognitively unempathic comments..." (contrast concerns understanding/responding to others' empathic behavior and mentalizing-related processing).
Global and local inclusion criteria are met for this construct. Construct evidence span: "Empathic interventions ... activity in right postcentral gyrus and left cerebellum."
Missing local inclusion criteria: AFFILIATION_ATTACHMENT_I1 (contrast compares empathic comments to baseline but does not explicitly measure affiliation/bonding).

Global and local inclusion criteria are met for this construct. Construct evidence span: "Empathic interventions ... activity in right postcentral gyrus and left cerebellum" (processing of verbal empathic interventions).
Missing local inclusion criteria: PERCEPTION_SELF_I1 (contrast does not index self-reflection or self > other processing).

Global and local inclusion criteria are met for this construct. Construct evidence span: "Empathic interventions ... activity in right postcentral gyrus and left cerebellum" (receiving empathic comments involves perceiving others' social support/intent).

Global and local inclusion criteria are met for this construct. Construct evidence span: "Emotionally empathic interventions... activated right precentral gyrus, left cerebellum, left inferior frontal gyrus and left middle temporal gyrus."

Global and local inclusion criteria are met for this construct. Construct evidence span: "Emotionally empathic interventions... activated ... left middle temporal gyrus" (processing auditory/verbal empathic content).

Global and local inclusion criteria are met for this construct. Construct evidence span: "Emotionally empathic interventions... activated ... left inferior frontal gyrus and left middle temporal gyrus" (processing others' empathic/compassionate social behavior).

Global and local inclusion criteria are met. Construct evidence span: "control of social attitudes (control of trust and distrust combined) > age".
Global criteria met and the contrast includes instructions to control trust (an affiliation-related interpersonal attitude). Construct evidence span: "control-of-trust task".

Excluded because the analysis does not measure self-related judgments or self > other contrasts; missing inclusion criterion PERCEPTION_SELF_I1.

Excluded because the contrast does not involve self-judgment or self > other comparisons; missing inclusion criterion PERCEPTION_SELF_I1.
Contrast probes understanding of others' intentions and traits (mentalizing) during trust control. Construct evidence span: "PrC and TPJ activity associated with control-of-trust".
Global and local inclusion criteria are met; the contrast measures social attitude control (distrust). Construct evidence span: "control-of-distrust condition > age".

Excluded because this contrast specifically measures distrust (negatively valenced social attitude) rather than positive affiliation/attachment; missing inclusion criterion AFFILIATION_ATTACHMENT_I1 (task measuring affiliation/attachment).
Contrast involves viewing faces and making social-evaluative judgments (facial communication). Construct evidence span: "evaluate the trustworthiness of faces".
Excluded because the analysis does not probe self-related processing or self judgments; missing inclusion criterion PERCEPTION_SELF_I1.
Contrast engages perception and reasoning about others' intentions/traits (mentalizing) during distrust control. Construct evidence span: "TPJ, mPFC activity during control-of-distrust".

This contrast does not target Social Communication tasks (e.g., faces, gaze, or explicit communicative production/reception). Missing inclusion criteria: SOCIAL_COMMUNICATION_I1, SOCIAL_COMMUNICATION_I2.
This contrast does not measure self-specific judgments or self>other contrasts. Missing inclusion criteria: PERCEPTION_SELF_I1, PERCEPTION_SELF_I2.
Global and local inclusion criteria are met for this construct. Construct evidence span: "reactive brain responses were greater during cooperative than competitive rounds in the mPFC and ACC."

Global and local inclusion criteria are met for this construct. Construct evidence span: "iBBDs elicited during the competitive condition was observed throughout brain areas involved predominantly in movement planning and attention processes".

The contrast directly contrasts cooperation and competition, which maps onto affiliation/attachment-related task distinctions. Construct evidence span: "cooperation compared with the competition condition" (inverse contrast considered here).

This contrast does not probe Social Communication constructs (faces, gaze, or explicit communicative reception/production). Missing inclusion criteria: SOCIAL_COMMUNICATION_I1, SOCIAL_COMMUNICATION_I2.
This contrast does not measure self-specific processes (no self>other or explicit self-judgment contrast). Missing inclusion criteria: PERCEPTION_SELF_I1, PERCEPTION_SELF_I2.

Although competition engages interactive processing, the Competition>Cooperation contrast primarily recruited motor/planning and insula regions (pre-SMA, IFG, anterior insula) rather than canonical mentalizing/empathy networks. Missing inclusion criteria: PERCEPTION_OTHERS_I1, PERCEPTION_OTHERS_I2.

Global and local inclusion criteria are met for this construct. Construct evidence span: "iBBDs were greater in the CN relative to the TB condition in the bilateral precentral gyri, temporoparietal cortices and thalami; and the right anterior insula and bilateral STS."
The interaction-structure contrast (CN vs TB) probes concurrent vs turn-based interaction formats rather than affiliation/attachment per se. Missing inclusion criteria: AFFILIATION_ATTACHMENT_I2.
This contrast does not specifically measure Social Communication (faces, gaze, or communicative production/reception). Missing inclusion criteria: SOCIAL_COMMUNICATION_I1, SOCIAL_COMMUNICATION_I2.
The CN>TB contrast targets interaction structure and mentalizing-related responses rather than explicit self-related judgments. Missing inclusion criteria: PERCEPTION_SELF_I1, PERCEPTION_SELF_I2.

Global and local inclusion criteria are met for this construct. Construct evidence span: "iBBDs were greater in the CN relative to the TB condition... in the bilateral STS and temporoparietal cortices (mentalizing regions)."

The reverse interaction contrast (TB > CN) showed no differential expressions of iBBDs after thresholding; thus it does not provide evidence that this contrast measures Social Processing. Missing inclusion criteria: SOCIAL_PROCESSING_ALL_I2.
No evidence that this contrast measures affiliation/attachment (no significant TB>CN effects reported). Missing inclusion criteria: AFFILIATION_ATTACHMENT_I1, AFFILIATION_ATTACHMENT_I2.
No evidence that this contrast measures Social Communication (no significant TB>CN effects reported). Missing inclusion criteria: SOCIAL_COMMUNICATION_I1, SOCIAL_COMMUNICATION_I2.
No evidence for self-related processing in this contrast (no significant TB>CN effects reported). Missing inclusion criteria: PERCEPTION_SELF_I1, PERCEPTION_SELF_I2.
No significant TB>CN effects were reported in regions supporting perception/understanding of others; thus missing inclusion criteria: PERCEPTION_OTHERS_I1, PERCEPTION_OTHERS_I2.
